compatibility.notes: The EUDatagrid license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses, as they may impose restrictions on distribution.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license statement in redistributions.
Include a notice in user documentation acknowledging the EU DataGrid.
If modifications are distributed, grant a license to the EU DataGrid participants.
license.name: EUDatagrid
obligations: Redistributions must reproduce the copyright notice and license statement.
User documentation must include a specific acknowledgment of the EU DataGrid.
Prior written permission is required to use certain names for endorsement.
